property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ During your turn, this creature can't leave except by being destroyed. {HYPERIFY} Tap one of your other creatures. (During your main step, you may unleash Hyper Mode. Hyper Mode stays until the start of your next turn.) ---- {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs less than the number of cards in your graveyard and destroy it.
